summary: "Spider-Man 2" is a 2004 superhero movie about Spider-Man, a character from Marvel Comics. Directed by Sam Raimi, the film stars Tobey Maguire as Peter Parker, who must stop scientist Dr. Otto Octavius from a dangerous experiment. Peter also faces an inner struggle between his superhero and personal lives. Shot in New York and Los Angeles, the film received critical acclaim and made a lot of money worldwide. It won an Academy Award for Best Visual Effects and is considered one of the best superhero movies, leading to a sequel, "Spider-Man 3," and later connecting to the Marvel Cinematic Universe.
title: Spider-Man 2
